title: OpenSSL SSL_write: SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL, errno 0
body:
### I did this

Upload of files to an FTP storage via SSL is broken in 8.10.1.

Run code from the file
[upload-test.txt](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/17201858/upload-test.txt)
